335: We are looking for a photographer who enjoys shooting fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. We have a lot of projects near and need a solid person that understands professionalism and leadership. Responsibilities: Develop creative strategies and ideas for TMKG Capture photos for numerous projects Work with the team to ensure productions are properly set up with equipment and personnel to execute the job Edit and retouch captured photographs Have the ability to travel, often on short notice Work with and mentor junior photographers Requirements: Professionalism Must live in New York or surrounding areas Please include a website with your resume Must have weekends available and flexibility 3+ years of professional experience as a photographer in fashion, beauty, and lifestyle Must be extremely well-versed in lighting, gear, editing/retouching, and digital asset management Works extremely well with deadlines Must have a track record of collaboration and teamwork Video experience is a plus+++ Must be a self-starter and comfortable on set with talent Benefits: Work with a great dynamic team Competitive & fast pay Flexible Contract Position Job Type: Contract Pay: From $100.00 per hour Benefits: Flexible schedule Ability to commute/relocate: New York, NY 10013: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Preferred) Experience: Photography: 3 years (Required) Work Location: In person
